item.title: About
item.description: About Annotorious Annotorious is a modernized reboot of my outdated original Annotorious, which I’m no longer supporting. License Annotrious is licensed under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause license. That basically means: feel free to use this code in whatever way you wish, for non-commerical and commercial projects. But keep the attribution/license file included. And bear in mind: this code comes as is. You get it for free, if breaks something, please report an issue, but don’t complain to us ;-)
